name: PERMABOND® TA4246
description: PERMABOND® TA4246 is a 2-part, no-mix, room temperature curing structural adhesive. It is ideal for use on a wide variety of substrate materials and forms a very high strength structural bond with excellent environmental durability and chemical resistance. It has high peel strength and excellent impact resistance and can be used to replace rivets or welding to give a more lightweight, durable assembly. Use with Permabond® Initiator 46.
